channel.title: [SFoL] SFoL 47 - GAME END - End of a Nightmare - BD & Fool win!
channel.description:
## [color=cerulean]Welcome to SFoL 47 - Abyss[/color] *Hosted by the person who made this thread!*
## [color=cerulean]Abyss?[/color] The main addition to this Special Forum of Lies is a new scum faction. The Abyss.
These twisted mind flayers have risen from the shadowy depths and seek to claim Adiart for their own vile purposes. Our scouts have displayed an abnormal fear upon witnessing such creatures...
Bending the minds of mortal men and slaying our kind without remorse... Some even whisper that they are trying to awaken some kind of Dark God that sleeps beneath the tides...
Their leader was dubbed 'The Dreamer' by one particularly... eccentric... scout. We have reports that he can steal the faces of the men he tortures... So... for all we know, any one of us could be one of these twisted creatures.
### [color=cerulean] Rules [/color]
https://forum.imperium42.com/t/forum-of-lies-official-hub/1515
### [color=cerulean] Gameplay [/color] Days will be 3 IRL days long, or shorter if someone dies Nights will be 1 IRL day long Actions are done by messaging me Scum will talk through a Forum PM. They may use alternative forms of communication, but need to add me to any. Priest will speak with the dead through a separate Forum PM Chain All classes will be used, and will be used as they are found in the [Class Cards Thread](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/fol-class-cards-now-officially-official/1998) When you receive a card you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it
### [color=cerulean] Executions [/color] To accuse someone say "**/accuse [player]**" or "**/vote [player]**" Once a player reaches a majority of the accusations, they are instantly executed and the day ends.
### [color=cerulean] Journals [/color] Message me your entire journal, the last draft I receive before you die shall be the one displayed
### [color=cerulean] To Join[/color] To join, simply express interest in joining by saying something like "I want to join" or "/join" or "/in" or "sign me up, coach" or whatever you want
# [color=cerulean]New Features[/color] New Scum Faction! The Abyss!
[color=cerulean]**Starting Abyss Members**[/color] [details="The Dreamer"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Dreamer [/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Special [/color]** **Unearthly (Passive)** - You are immune to occupation and target changing. You will be informed if someone attempts to occupy or redirect you. **Endless Dream (Passive)** - If you die, all living blue dragon will become afraid. If you are killed at night then the starting Devout may take your place. **Facestealer (Day)** - Choose a class. You will appear as this class to any investigations. This effect lasts until you use this ability again. - Infinite uses **Mind Rend (Night)** - Convert a player into their Abyss counterpart. - Infinite Uses, 1 night cooldown. **Terror (Night)** - Cause two players to become afraid. This does nothing on it's own, but certain Abyss classes can benefit from fear. Fear lasts until it is removed. - Infinite uses *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details]
[details="The Devout"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Devout [/color] :shield: :crossed_swords: >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Killer [/color]** **Fear Monger (Passive)** - Whenever a player who is afraid dies, you generate 2 Terror Fragments. You are informed of how many terror fragments you have. After you die, you lose two terror fragments and all Terror Fragments you posses will be passed along to the next Devout. **Cycle of Madness (Passive)** - If there is no Devout at any point, the next non-Dreamer Abyss in line will become The Devout. If there exist no other non-Dreamer Abyssians, the next successful convert will instead become The Devout. **He Awakens (Day)** - Consume 20 Terror Fragments. Immediately end the game. Only Abyssians and neutrals who have already won will be victorious. - 1 use **Sacrifice (Night)** - Kill a player. - Infinite uses **Empower (Night)** - Consume 6 Terror Fragments. Kill two players. - Infinite uses. *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* [/details]
[color=cerulean]**Abyss Converts**[/color]
[details="The Dominator (Converted from the Knight, Drunk, Archer, and Butler)"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Dominator[/color] >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Offensive [/color]** **Hivemind (Passive)** - You are immune to occupation and target changing. **Eldritch Taint (Passive)** - Any targets you visit will become afraid. **Dominate (Night)** - Occupy a player. If they are already afraid, this will bypass occupy immunity. - Infinite uses **Psychic Scream (Night)** - Occupy all players afflicted with Fear. This ability does not visit and bypasses visit prevention. - 1 use *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>**Converted from [color=steblue]The Knight[/color], [color=steblue]The Drunk[/color] and [color=steblue]The Butler[/color].** [/details]
[details="The Stygian (Converted from the Physician, Chronomancer, and Court Wizard)"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Stygian[/color] >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Support [/color]** **Uncanny Flesh (Passive)** - You are immune to bleeding. **Nightmare (Day)** - Tonight, all members of the Abyss will appear as Blue Dragon to investigations. - 1 use **Bind Essence (Night)** - Heal a member of the abyss from attacks and bleeding tonight. - Infinite uses. **Waves of Madness (Night)** - Prevent all visits to a player. Anyone who attempts to visit them will become afraid. - 3 uses. *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>**Converted from [color=steblue]The Physician[/color], [color=steblue]The Court Wizard[/color] and [color=steblue]The Chronomancer[/color].** [/details]
[details="The Decadent (Converted from Noble and Mystic)"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Decadent[/color] >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Social [/color]** **Silence of the Sea (Day)** - Your vote will count silently as two today. - 2 Uses **Maddening Whisper (Day)** - Send an anonymous 1000 character message to a player. They will also become afraid. - 2 uses **Social Sacrifice (Night)** - Mark a player. If they are executed tomorrow, the Devout will gain 6 Terror Fragments. - 1 use. **Deception (Night)** - Target a player. Tonight, they will show up as an Abyss Killer to investigations. - 2 uses. *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>**Converted from [color=steblue]The Noble[/color] and [color=steblue]The Mystic[/color].** [/details]
[details="The Lurker (Converted from Therapist, Observer, Princess and Maid)"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Lurker[/color] >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Investigative [/color]** **Many Eyes (Day)** - The next time a day ability is used, you will know who used it. - 2 uses **Lurk (Night)** - Follow a player and learn who they visit. If they are afraid, you will also learn who all visits them. - Infinite uses **Infiltrate Cerebrum (Night)** - Learn a player's class. - 2 uses *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>**Converted from [color=steblue]The Princess[/color], [color=steblue]The Maid[/color] and [color=steblue]The Observer[/color].** [/details]
[details="The Nameless (Converted from the Priest and Hunter)"] > # [color = "cerulean"] The Nameless[/color] >**[color = "cerulean"] Abyss Special [/color]** **Terrifying Presence (Passive)** - While you are alive, the amount of Terror Fragments that The Devout gains are all doubled. **Sanguine Fear (Day)** - Target a player. If they are afraid, they will begin to bleed and die in two nights. - 2 uses. **Probe Emotion (Day)** - Learn if a player is afraid. - Infinite uses, can be used twice per day. **Terror (Night)** - Cause a player to become afraid. - Infinite uses **Visions of the Deep (Night)** - If all living non-abyss players are afraid, you will change the King into an Eldritch King. - 1 use *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>**Converted from [color=steblue]The Hunter[/color] and [color=steblue]The Priest[/color].** [/details]
[details="The Eldritch King "] ># [color=cerulean]The Eldritch King[/color] :crossed_swords: :shield: > >[color=cerulean]**Abyss Special**[/color] **Pass The Torch (Passive)** - If you die, there will be a vote held to crown the next King. **Head of State (Passive)** - Your vote counts as two if there are more than 5 players alive. Immune to occupation and redirection. **Grand Trial (Passive)** - Instantly put a player on trial for treason. They may provide a defense, and then the players alive may either vote to execute or pardon. If a majority of players vote to execute, the day will end and the player on trial will be lynched. Otherwise, the day will continue as normal. - 1 use **Guard! (Night)** - Choose a player. They will be immune to death tonight. - 3 uses **Fear (Night)** - Make a player become afraid. - Infinite uses *Your objective is to defeat the Blue Dragon and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.* --- [/details]
[color=steblue]**The Brave One!**[/color]
[details="The Therapist"] > # [color = "steblue"] The Therapist[/color] >**[color = "steblue"] Blue Dragon Investigative[/color]** **Brave Soul (Passive)** - You will be informed if you become afraid. **Inspect (Night)** - Learn if a player is a member of the Abyss. - Infinite uses **Embrace Vice (Night)** - Prevent all visits to yourself. You will remove fear from yourself if you are afraid, and anybody who visits you will lose fear if they have it. - 2 use *Your objective is to defeat the Abyss and any neutrals that seek to do you harm.*
>**Converts into the Lurker** [/details]
# [color=cerulean]Other Changes and Things to Note[/color] [quote="Geyde, post:7398, topic:36636, full:true"]
># [color=#86a94a]The Mercenary[/color] >[color=grey]**Neutral Support**[/color] **Failure (Passive)** - If your targets both die, you will commit suicide. **Saviour (Day)** - If one of your targets is voted for execution today, take their place. - 1 use **Stand Guard (Night)** - Prevent non-conversion abilities from targeting one of your targets. In addition, you are death immune this night. - 4 uses _Your objective is to ensure that at least one of your targets remains alive until the end of the game, your targets are [x] and [y]._
> The Mercenary's targets will always be convertible Blue Dragon classes, Neutral Killer or starting Cult/Unseen. [/quote]
If Merc rolls, this will be what it is
* Royal Blood isn't on any of the Abyss class cards. Why? Because Royal Blood will now pass on directly if you had it before you were converted!
* Members of the Abyss CAN inflict other Abyssians with fear.
* The Faction cap for the Abyss is 3
* You aren't notified if you are afraid. Only certain special investigative abilities can find that out.
[details="Role List"] [color=gold]**The King (65% Good / 35% Eldritch)**[/color] [color=steblue]**The Prince**[/color] [color=cerulean]**The Dreamer**[/color] [color=cerulean]**The Devout**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] [color=steblue]**Random Blue Dragon**[/color] / [color=grey]**Random Non-Killing Neutral**[/color] [color=grey]**Random Non-Killing Neutral**[/color] [color=grey]**Random Neutral Killer**[/color]
[/details]
# [color=cerulean]Players: [/color] 1. ~~Magnus~~ Fool 2. ~~Margaret~~ Therapist 3. DatBird 4. Kai 5. Alice :crown: 6. Fireslol 7. Possessed 8. ~~Hjasik~~ Reaper 9. Meteoro 10. Priestess 11. ~~WazzaAzza~~ Knight 12. ~~Bazingaboy~~ Princess 13. Isaac_Gonzalez 14. ~~Astand~~ Physician 15. Soulshade 16. Frostwolf
Backups:
1. PokemonKidRyan

item.title: [SFoL] SFoL 47 - GAME END - End of a Nightmare - BD & Fool win!
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
now what I use the most are the following two:
"very nice". It will only give you results with the entire phrase on it. It is also useful on solo words if you don’t want “ambiguous” results
site:url only gives you results in the selected url

Read full topic
item.source: [SFoL] SFoL 47 - GAME END - End of a Nightmare - BD & Fool win!

item.title: [SFoL] SFoL 47 - GAME END - End of a Nightmare - BD & Fool win!
item.dc:creator: Mercenary
item.description:
“define” or “what is” will give you the dictionary meaning of a word
by putting an URL in the search bar and search by image, you can see similiar images or reverse search it
there is academic google, which searched through scientific papers only
intitle:“word” will give you only results in which the word is on the title
it has a calculator and if google is your primary search service you can use it without even searching

advanced search overall, I use it mostly to tavel back in time and see things in english
it has a timer, search for timer
it converts units and it is the same logic of the math thingy

you can search “flip a coin” to get a coinflip
it has a hex colour wheel if you google any hex color

Read full topic
